org.typemeta.funcj.codec

Interface CodecCore<E>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - the encoded type
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    JsonCodecCore, XmlCodecCore
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseCodecCore, JsonCodecCoreImpl, XmlCodecCoreImpl

    public interface CodecCore<E>
    Interface for classes which implement an encoding into a specific target type {code E}. Unlike Codec, which can only encode a single type, CodecCore implementations will handle any type.

    • Method Summary

      • registerCodec

        <T> ObjectCodecBuilder<T,E> registerCodec(Class<T> clazz)
        Create a ObjectCodecBuilder for the specified class.

        Create a ObjectCodecBuilder, essentially a fluent interface for creating and registering a Codec.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the codec value type
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class to register codec against
        Returns:
        an ObjectCodecBuilder

      • registerStringProxyCodec

        <T> void registerStringProxyCodec(Class<T> clazz,
                                  Functions.F<T,String> encode,
                                  Functions.F<String,T> decode)
        Create and register a Codecs.StringProxyCodec for a class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the codec value type
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class to register codec against
        encode - a function to encode a value of type T as a String
        decode - a function to decode a String back into a value of type T

      • registerTypeProxy

        void registerTypeProxy(Class<?> type,
                       Class<?> proxyType)
        Register a type proxy. A type proxy maps a type to its proxy before selecting its Codec.
        Parameters:
        type - type to be mapped
        proxyType - proxy type

      • encode

        <T> E encode(T val,
             E enc)
        Encode a non-null value of type T into encoded form E
        Type Parameters:
        T - the decoded value type
        Parameters:
        val - the value to encode
        enc - the encoded parent (may be null for certain encodings)
        Returns:
        the encoded value

             E enc)
        Encode a value of type T into encoded form E.

        T - the decoded value type
        Parameters:
